short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A minimal browser extension to allow you to share a scratchpad over the network.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Want to share a short piece of snippet to another device on the network without needing to open email, whatsapp or any other third party tool? With Wifishare, you can. No need to login into or install any 3rd party software.Just install this extension and you're done.
